scenario: Its the year 2024 and AI has taken over, tell me about how AI has affected Jobs and Art.
response:
AI technology has definitely shifted the way people work and appreciate art. Jobs that used to be human-only have been completely automated, with AI taking over many of the tasks that would be previously been done by people. This has caused disruption to the labor market and led to job losses in certain sectors. 

At the same time, however, AI has also opened up new job opportunities and led to the development of more efficient ways of carrying out tasks. Additionally, AI has enabled humans to do more creative work and has moved art into a new era. AI has enabled artists to create digital artwork, such as generative art or computer-generated artwork, in a way that would have previously been impossible. Likewise, AI has helped humans
